goal.ch:
修完本課程，學生應能:
1. 大致理解短篇口播新聞內容
2. 掌握中篇口播新聞主旨與大綱，並能以口語簡述摘要
3. 具有提取新聞關鍵詞與大意之能力
4. 了解及應用相關主題的常見新聞用語與詞彙
goal.en:
On successful completion of this course, students will be able to
1. generally comprehend short audio news
2. grasp the main idea and outline of long short audio news
3. build up the ability of extracting the main meaning and keywords of a piece of news
4. understand and apply the common news terms and vocabulary to relevant topics
